title: Plutonium
desc:
Post 873
*google says its the most dangerous element in the world, and it generates significant heat, at around 1922 F (1050 C).*
- Choose a player.
- If this card is <:red:1106234051129507932>, they are on fire and skip two of their turns to put it out.
- If this card is <:gray:1107516393450127411>, they are dying, and they draw cards until they draw a <:green:1106234108042031166> card.
